eecs.jago.element
Interface Monitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardRobot
public interface Monitor

An object that can monitor sensors.

Method Detail

getSensorInput

public int getSensorInput(int inputNumber)
Returns the value of the sensor connected to the specified input

Parameters:
inputNumber - The input, one of RCX_1, RCX_2, RCX_3
Returns:
The value of the input

addSensor

public void addSensor(int input,
                      int sensorType)
Connects a sensor to the specified sensor input.

Parameters:
input - The input number to add to, one of RCX_1, RCX_2, or RCX_3
sensorType - The type of sensor

addSensor

public void addSensor(int input,
                      StandardSensor sensor)
Connects a sensor to the specified input.

Parameters:
input - The input number that the sensor is connected to, one of RCX_1, RCX_2, or RCX_3
sensor - A StandardSensor to connect.

updateSensors

public void updateSensors()
Updates all the sensors. This method must send the required information to each connected sensor to ensure they all have current readings. Generally this should be done each time the Monitor is updated or drawn.
